alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 2:54PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Haskell, Jones and southeastern Fisher Counties through 400 PM CST... At 254 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tuxedo, or 8 miles south of Sagerton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haskell, Stamford, Anson, Hamlin, Rule, Rochester, Weinert, O`brien, Irby, Sylvester, Noodle, Mccaulley, Paint Creek, Avoca, Neinda, Sagerton, Lake Stamford Marina, Funston, Us-277 Near The Haskell- Knox County Line and Jud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
